forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind around 13 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As morning light spills over Downtown San Francisco, the city appears wrapped in a gentle embrace of warmth and vibrancy. The low clouds that often cloak the Bay are lifting, yielding to a promising day that will reveal pockets of brilliant sunshine filtered through a soft haze. The air is crisp, yet it carries the whispers of a more temperate afternoon that will beckon the active soul outdoors. The presence of the west-southwest winds offers a refreshing breeze, putting a vivifying bite into the air, ideal for both a leisurely breakfast at a local café or a stroll along the waterfront.

As we anticipate golden rays peering down, the unfolding scene paints a picture of clarity and warmth, enchanting for those who take the time to appreciate it. Dressing in light layers will provide comfort as the temperature subtly shifts from the cool embrace of morning into the gentle warmth by midday. Today is perfect for a leisurely walk through the Presidio, where one might savor the sight of the Golden Gate Bridge framed against a brightening sky, or perhaps enjoy a quiet moment of reflection at one of the city’s charming parks. In this dance of sun and sea, the day invites you to engage with both the serene and invigorating rhythm of San Francisco life.
